definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a housing that is physically separable from the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a housing that is physically separable from the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a frame of a film that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a frame of a film that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a page of a volume that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a page of a volume that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a screen of a digital manifestation that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a screen of a digital manifestation that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a sheet in a set of sheets that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a sheet in a set of sheets that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a card in a set of cards that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a card in a set of cards that contains information about title proper, statement of responsibility, publication, or other aspect of the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a human-readable label that is permanently affixed to the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a human-readable label that is permanently affixed to the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a protective binding of a volume.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a protective binding of a volume.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a detachable, protective wrapping of a volume.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a detachable, protective wrapping of a volume.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that appears on a first page, editorial page, or list of contents page in the manifestation of each issue of a serial work.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that appears on a first page, editorial page, or list of contents page in the manifestation of each issue of a serial work.
scope note[0]_en: A masthead usually contains statements about a title proper, statement of responsibility, publication information, or other common aspects of the embodiment of each issue.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a textual augmentation of a still image that contains information about title, brief description, or other aspect of the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is a textual augmentation of a still image that contains information about title, brief description, or other aspect of the manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is metadata embedded in an online manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is metadata embedded in an online manifestation.

definition[0]_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is an additional title page bearing a title proper of series and other information about a successive work, and information relating to an issue of the work that is embodied by the manifestation.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A source of information in a manifestation that is an additional title page bearing a title proper of series and other information about a successive work, and information relating to an issue of the work that is embodied by the manifestation.
